Description: The data zone is the key small-area statistical geography in Scotland.
aggregations of data zones within local authorities which contains between 2,500 and 6,000 people.
All people in the statistics between age 16 to 74

Field name: Work mainly at or from home
Description: number of people in the age bracket who work mainly at or from home per data zone.

Field name: Underground metro light rail or tram
Description: number of people who travel to work via underground metro light rail or tram per data zone
number of people who travel to work via train per data zone
number of people who travel to work using a Bus, minibus or coach
number of people who travel to work using a taxi or minicab
number of people who travel to work by driving a car or a van per data zone

Field name: Passenger in a car or van
Description: Number of people who travel to work by being a passenger in a car or van
Number of people who travel to work using a motorcycle scooter or moped
Number of people who travel to work using a bicycle
Number of people who travel to work on foot
Number of people who travel to work using other means of transportation.
